additionalTextInformation.text:
A very similar composition but of a slightly smaller format is known to exist in a privated colection [PRIVATE_NONE-P311].

[cda 2021]

pageContext.description:
The painting depicts the first couple in front of the tree of knowledge against a backdrop of shrubbery. Eve stands on the right holding an apple in each hand. she captures Adam's gaze and offers him the apple in her right hand. The scene is animated by a pair of partridges, deer and a stag, as well as the serpent in the tree.
[cda 2021]
